column4: can someone help me with the following? "ifdown: interface eth0 not configured Ignoring unknown interface eth0=eth0"
that's the lease expire from your DHCP
you can configure your dhcp client to ignore DNS settings that are pushed to you.
modify your dhcp client setup to ignore DNS push from your server.
gksudo gedit /etc/dhcp3/dhclient.conf -- line 20, remove domain-name-servers, (with the comma) and save the file.
It still says, "bound to 192.168.203.96 -- renewal in 18013 seconds." Thoughts?
that's fine, it has nothing to with your DNS.
btw, opendns has been having problems lately.
personal experience -- stale entries, bad records, etc.
What is " use 4.2.2.2 and 4.2.2.3" that and where do I use it.
